typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		na_code as string,
		na_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tNotApplicable
source(output(
		dimension_name as string,
		top_key as string,
		top_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tTopGroup
source(output(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_id as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_number as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_key as string,
		top_description as string,
		cpt_id as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_description as string,
		top_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LKPDimCapital
tTopGroup filter(dimension_name=='dim_capital') ~> Filter1
tNotApplicable derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_desc = 'All Capital') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, Filter1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Exists2, LKPDimCapital exists(na_code == cpt_key,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
Union1, LKPDimCapital exists(na_code == cpt_key,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists2
